subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Fabian Cancellara of Switzerland shook off Tom Boonen of Belgium on the toughest climb of the Tour of Flanders and raced away to a victory by 1 minute 14 seconds Sunday in Meerbeke, Belgium.
snippet: Fabian Cancellara of Switzerland shook off Tom Boonen of Belgium on the toughest climb of the Tour of Flanders and raced away to a victory by 1 minute 14 seconds Sunday in Meerbeke, Belgium.
